properties.name: ecos-notifications.event.host
properties.description: Host for connect to ecos-events rabbitmq.

properties.name: ecos-notifications.event.port
properties.description: Port for connect to ecos-events rabbitmq.

properties.name: ecos-notifications.event.username
properties.description: Username for connect to ecos-events rabbitmq.

properties.name: ecos-notifications.event.password
properties.description: Password for connect to ecos-events rabbitmq.

properties.name: ecos-notifications.firebase.credential-class-path
properties.description: Class path to credentials for connecting to firebase admin sdk.

properties.name: ecos-notifications.firebase.data-base-url
properties.description: Fire base DB url to credentials for connecting to firebase admin sdk.
